header.name: Parijat Khan
header.title: Solution Designer
header.summary: Solutions Architect, Technical Lead and Polyglot engineer with over 10 years of experience designing and delivering scalable enterprise solutions. Proven expertise in bridging the gap between complex architectural concepts and hands-on full-stack development. A strategic thinker dedicated to driving technical excellence, mentoring cross-functional teams, and leveraging emerging technologies to solve business-critical challenges.

careerHighlights.title: Full-Stack Expertise
careerHighlights.description: Deep expertise in Java, .NET, and Python ecosystems. Capable of architecting complex backends and building intuitive frontends.

careerHighlights.title: AI & Agentic Systems
careerHighlights.description: Skilled in developing autonomous agents using Pydantic, Semantic Kernel, and modern LLM orchestration patterns.

careerHighlights.title: Certified Professional
careerHighlights.description: Holder of 8+ industry certifications including AWS Architect, CKA (Kubernetes), and Google Cloud Architect.

roles.title: Lead Developer
roles.description: Lead enterprise application initiatives and steer delivery of scalable, cloud-ready solutions
achievements: Drive technical excellence and continuous innovation across the software portfolio
Shape architecture decisions and codify best practices to safeguard scalability
Partner with cross-functional stakeholders to deliver resilient, production-ready applications

roles.title: Senior Advanced Software Engineer
roles.description: Led development of customized Voice workflow solutions for customers across APAC, EMEA, and the USA
achievements: Captured client requirements end to end and deployed tailored Voice workflows for six customers across three regions
Built five reusable Java modules and two greenfield C# applications that became part of the Core Voice offering
Optimized the Core Java middleware to sustain assignments 10x larger than the previous limit
Absorbed new Honeywell Voice solutions quickly and trained the team, trimming adoption time by 60%
Designed a Python-Django release management service with a React.js UI to streamline deployments

roles.title: Advanced Software Engineer
roles.description: Served as team lead for custom solution delivery and high-velocity proof of concepts
achievements: Directed five-person engineering and QA squad across nine delivery projects and four proofs of concept
Contributed to solution architecture for six customer-specific customizations
Independently delivered five pilots that secured the follow-on engagements
Standardized the custom build pipeline, shrinking human errors by 52% and build times by 43%

roles.title: Senior Engineer
roles.description: Implemented complex custom solutions while advancing innovation through internal hackathons
achievements: Delivered four custom solutions ahead of schedule while managing competing priorities
Drove proof-of-concept development through internal hackathons, earning second place in one event

roles.title: Software Engineer
roles.description: Contributed to yellow-pages middleware development on the Java Spring stack
achievements: Developed five middleware modules leveraging Java Spring
Performed peer code reviews to maintain delivery quality
Supported module design efforts during sprint planning
Completed ramp-up on Media and Information Services domain and yellow-pages platforms within three months
Rotated across multiple backend modules to deepen domain expertise

certificates.name: Building Scalable Java Microservices with Spring Boot and Spring Cloud
